functional_requirements.description: System shall be deployed on Hostinger VPS with 4GB RAM
System shall use Docker containers for service isolation
System shall implement CI/CD pipeline for automated deployments
System shall perform daily automated backups of database and files
System shall provide health monitoring endpoints
System shall use HTTPS with valid SSL certificate
System shall authenticate users via JWT tokens
System shall support 5 user roles: ADMIN, HR_MANAGER, ACCOUNTANT, EMPLOYEE, EXTERNAL_CA
System shall enforce role-based access control on all endpoints
System shall support password reset via email
System shall lock accounts after 5 failed login attempts
System shall log all authentication events for audit
System shall expire JWT tokens after 24 hours
System shall hash passwords using bcrypt with salt
System shall store employee personal information including name, DOB, gender, contact details
System shall maintain employee work history with designations and departments
System shall store employee statutory IDs (PAN, Aadhaar, UAN, ESI number)
System shall manage employee bank account details for salary credits
System shall track employee status (Active, Resigned, Terminated)
System shall maintain emergency contact information
System shall allow employees to update their own non-sensitive information
System shall generate employee ID automatically in format EMP-YYYY-XXXX
System shall maintain complete employment timeline with join date and exit date
System shall store documents with categorization (Personal, HR, Finance, Legal)
System shall support document versioning with history
System shall allow document tagging for easy retrieval
System shall support PDF, Excel, Word, and image file formats
System shall enforce document access control based on user role
System shall track document expiry dates and send reminders
System shall provide full-text search within documents
System shall generate document previews for quick viewing
System shall create onboarding workflow with configurable task checklist
System shall assign tasks to specific users (HR, Manager, Employee)
System shall track task completion status and due dates
System shall send reminder notifications for pending tasks
System shall mark onboarding complete when all mandatory tasks done
System shall support document collection as part of onboarding
System shall support multiple leave types (Earned, Sick, Casual, LOP)
System shall configure leave policies with accrual rules
System shall calculate leave balances automatically
System shall support leave application workflow with approvals
System shall prevent leave application exceeding balance
System shall support half-day leave applications
System shall maintain leave history for reporting
System shall integrate leave data with payroll for LOP deductions
System shall display company holiday calendar
System shall send notifications for leave approval/rejection
System shall allow employees to log time against projects and tasks
System shall support weekly timesheet submission
System shall require manager approval for timesheets
System shall validate minimum 8 hours per working day
System shall track billable vs non-billable hours
System shall send reminders for timesheet submission
System shall generate timesheet reports by project and employee
System shall define salary structures with earnings and deductions
System shall calculate gross salary based on CTC breakdown
System shall calculate statutory deductions (PF, ESI, PT, TDS)
System shall generate monthly payroll with all calculations
System shall generate payslips in PDF format
System shall support salary revision with effective dates
System shall handle LOP deductions from leave data
System shall support reimbursements and ad-hoc payments
System shall maintain payroll history for each employee
System shall generate bank transfer file for salary payments
System shall calculate year-to-date earnings and deductions
System shall calculate employee PF at 12% of PF wages
System shall calculate employer PF with EPS (8.33%) and EPF split
System shall cap EPS contribution at Rs 1250 (Rs 15000 wage limit)
System shall calculate admin charges at 0.5%
System shall generate ECR (Electronic Challan cum Return) file
System shall track PF remittance due date (15th of following month)
System shall maintain UAN for each employee
System shall calculate employee ESI at 0.75% of gross wages
System shall calculate employer ESI at 3.25% of gross wages
System shall apply ESI only for employees with wages <= Rs 21000
System shall generate ESI monthly contribution report
System shall track ESI remittance due date (15th of following month)
System shall maintain ESI number for each applicable employee
System shall calculate Karnataka PT at Rs 200/month
System shall apply Rs 300 for February (annual adjustment)
System shall apply PT only for salaries > Rs 15000
System shall generate PT monthly report
System shall track total annual PT at Rs 2500
System shall calculate TDS using new tax regime slabs 2024-25
System shall apply standard deduction of Rs 75000
System shall calculate tax based on projected annual income
System shall apply 4% health and education cess on tax
System shall distribute annual TDS across 12 months
System shall generate Form 16 for each employee
System shall support tax computation statement
System shall recalculate TDS on salary revision
System shall maintain chart of accounts with hierarchical structure
System shall support account types: Asset, Liability, Equity, Income, Expense
System shall create journal entries with debit and credit
System shall enforce double-entry accounting (debits = credits)
System shall post transactions to general ledger automatically
System shall generate trial balance
System shall support fiscal year with period close
System shall prevent modifications to closed periods
System shall maintain audit trail for all GL entries
System shall support multiple currencies with INR as base
System shall maintain exchange rates with effective dates
System shall convert foreign currency transactions to INR
System shall calculate and post realized exchange gains/losses
System shall support USD, EUR, GBP currencies for invoicing
System shall maintain customer master with contact and billing details
System shall create invoices with line items and taxes
System shall calculate GST on invoices (CGST+SGST or IGST)
System shall generate invoice PDF with company branding
System shall track invoice payment status (Pending, Partial, Paid)
System shall support credit notes for invoice adjustments
System shall track accounts receivable aging
System shall send payment reminders for overdue invoices
System shall record customer payments and match to invoices
System shall generate customer statement of account
System shall maintain vendor master with contact and banking details
System shall record vendor bills with line items and taxes
System shall verify GST on vendor bills
System shall track bill payment status (Pending, Partial, Paid)
System shall support debit notes for bill adjustments
System shall track accounts payable aging
System shall record vendor payments and match to bills
System shall calculate TDS on applicable vendor payments
System shall generate vendor payment summary
System shall maintain multiple bank accounts with details
System shall record bank transactions (deposits, withdrawals, transfers)
System shall import bank statements from Excel/CSV
System shall perform bank reconciliation with auto-matching
System shall track unreconciled transactions
System shall generate bank reconciliation report
System shall record cheque details and track clearance
System shall support payment modes (NEFT, RTGS, UPI, Cheque)
System shall apply GST at 18% for IT services
System shall split GST into CGST (9%) and SGST (9%) for intra-state
System shall apply IGST (18%) for inter-state transactions
System shall generate GSTR-1 return (outward supplies)
System shall generate GSTR-3B return (summary return)
System shall track GSTR-1 due date (11th of following month)
System shall track GSTR-3B due date (20th of following month)
System shall calculate input tax credit (ITC) from vendor bills
System shall generate GST payment challan
System shall validate customer GSTIN format
System shall configure TDS sections with rates (194C, 194J, etc.)
System shall calculate TDS on vendor payments based on section
System shall track TDS threshold limits per vendor
System shall generate Form 26Q (quarterly TDS return)
System shall issue TDS certificates (Form 16A) to vendors
System shall track TDS remittance due dates
System shall maintain vendor PAN for TDS compliance
System shall capture and manage leads with contact details
System shall track lead status (New, Contacted, Qualified, Lost)
System shall convert qualified leads to customers
System shall manage opportunities with value and probability
System shall log activities (calls, emails, meetings) against leads
System shall generate sales pipeline report
System shall create projects with details and budget
System shall link projects to customers
System shall allocate employees to projects with roles
System shall track project status (Active, On Hold, Completed)
System shall create tasks within projects
System shall track actual vs budgeted hours from timesheets
System shall generate project profitability report
System shall support project milestones and deliverables
System shall implement AI fallback chain (Claude > Gemini > OpenAI > Together AI)
System shall classify AI confidence as High (>=95%), Medium (70-94%), Low (<70%)
System shall auto-execute high confidence AI suggestions
System shall queue medium confidence items for review
System shall flag low confidence items for manual handling
System shall parse documents using AI (invoices, bills, bank statements)
System shall provide AI-assisted data entry suggestions
System shall track AI usage and costs per provider
System shall implement request caching to reduce API calls
System shall log all AI interactions for audit and improvement
System shall generate Profit & Loss statement
System shall generate Balance Sheet
System shall generate Cash Flow statement
System shall generate Trial Balance
System shall generate Accounts Receivable aging report
System shall generate Accounts Payable aging report
System shall generate Employee payroll summary
System shall generate Leave balance report
System shall generate Timesheet utilization report
System shall generate GST summary report
System shall export reports to PDF and Excel formats
System shall support date range filters on all reports
